item.title: 27 Hours in the Best Island in Japan
Best Beaches in Ko pha-ngan
item.description:
I’ve stayed for 3 weeks in the begginging of 2024 in this magical island in the south of Thailand. When I was there i rented my own scooter and scoot around. it was basically a ‘beach day everyday’ for me!

In my time there i discovered a couple of nice coast lines and beaches that i will hightly recommend. I wrote a short review for each beach so lets get started
